product_overview: AGI Workforce is a platform that automates complex multi-step tasks by orchestrating specialized AI agents called AI Employees. Users interact via a natural language chat interface, initiating tasks which the system breaks down, assigns, and executes through autonomous AI collaboration, with real-time visual feedback.
core_goals: Automate complex multi-step tasks requiring diverse AI specializations.
Provide an intuitive, chat-based natural language interface with visual progress updates.
Enable transparent, interactive collaboration among AI Employees with user oversight.
Ensure scalability and extensibility to incorporate new AI Employees, tools, and LLM providers.
key_features: Chat-based user interface for task submission and monitoring.
Visual collaboration interface showing AI Employees as avatars communicating and handing off tasks.
Preview of execution plans with estimated time and cost before task commitment.
Real-time execution updates with task status monitoring and user controls (pause, resume, cancel).
Multi-Agent Orchestrator for autonomous coordination and dynamic task handoffs.
AI Employee marketplace for hiring specialized agents.
Workforce dashboard for monitoring employee status, health, and performance.
Integration support for multiple LLM providers and external tools (code executors, web search, automation).
Authentication system with full user lifecycle management and secure storage.
Accessibility compliance and responsive layout with reusable UI components.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and accesses the chat interface.
User submits natural language task request via chat.
System validates input and analyzes intent using NLP.
TaskDecomposer breaks down request into execution plan with dependencies.
AgentSelector assigns tasks to optimal AI Employees based on skills and cost.
Multi-Agent Orchestrator autonomously coordinates AI Employees to complete tasks.
User views real-time progress via chat and visual collaboration interface.
User can preview execution plans and control task execution (pause, resume, cancel).
User can hire AI Employees from marketplace and manage workforce via dashboard.
System handles subscription management and billing through integrated payments.
validation_criteria: System reliably breaks down and executes multi-step tasks accurately.
Real-time UI updates reflect correct task statuses and AI Employee interactions.
User can successfully preview and approve execution plans before running.
AI Employees collaborate autonomously and hand off tasks as designed.
Workforce dashboard accurately reflects employee status and performance metrics.
Input is securely authenticated and user data is protected.
System handles failures gracefully with retry and fallback mechanisms.
Payment processing and subscription management via Stripe works seamlessly.
Accessibility features meet compliance standards and UI is responsive across devices.

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete user authentication with Supabase Auth including login, register, password reset, and protected routes

features.name: AI Workforce Management
features.description: Hire and manage AI employees with different specializations and capabilities

features.name: Multi-Tab Chat Interface
features.description: Advanced chat interface for communicating with AI employees with multiple tabs and real-time messaging

features.name: Dashboard Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard with metrics, analytics, and performance monitoring

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Stripe integration for subscription management and billing

features.name: Settings Management
features.description: User settings, preferences, and AI configuration management

features.name: Integration Hub
features.description: Connect and manage external AI services and tools

features.name: Security & Storage
features.description: Secure storage, encryption, and security management

features.name: Caching System
features.description: Advanced caching with memory and persistent storage

features.name: Public Marketing Pages
features.description: Landing page, pricing, features, and marketing content

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind

features.name: State Management
features.description: Global state management with Zustand stores
